title: The awareness rate of knowledge of chronic diseases and influencing factors among 4790 adults in anhui province: An online survey using WeChat
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Xiu-Ya Xing, Zhen-Zhen Wu, Hua-Dong Wang, Wei Xu, Dan Cao, Zhi-Rong Liu, Guo-Cui Wu
